text:
When I try to connect via freetds into a SQL server with odbc_connect function,
apache2 crash.
The Server runs with Ubuntu Edgy x86_64.

ISQL works fine.

*** glibc detected *** /usr/sbin/apache2: malloc(): memory corruption:
0x000000000087e240 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib/libc.so.6[0x2af0035da073]
/lib/libc.so.6(malloc+0x7d)[0x2af0035db6dd]
/usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so(_emalloc+0x1bd)[0x2af00433755d]
/usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so(zend_stack_init+0x14)[0x2af00434dee4]
/usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so(shutdown_executor+0x11a)[0x2af00434354a]
/usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so(zend_deactivate+0x97)[0x2af00434e8a7]
/usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so(php_request_shutdown+0x1fa)[0x2af0043111da]
/usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so[0x2af0043cb99d]
/usr/sbin/apache2(ap_run_handler+0x7a)[0x4356ea]
/usr/sbin/apache2(ap_invoke_handler+0x72)[0x4387f2]
/usr/sbin/apache2(ap_process_request+0x158)[0x4287f8]
/usr/sbin/apache2[0x4237b0]
/usr/sbin/apache2(ap_run_process_connection+0x72)[0x440ab2]
/usr/sbin/apache2[0x4343c1]
/usr/sbin/apache2[0x4345e4]
/usr/sbin/apache2[0x434687]
/usr/sbin/apache2(ap_mpm_run+0x7ba)[0x434e5a]
/usr/sbin/apache2(main+0x5d0)[0x43b000]
/lib/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xf4)[0x2af0035880c4]
/usr/sbin/apache2(apr_bucket_mmap_make+0x69)[0x41f8c9]
creator: uzanatta@gmail.com
nick@webthing.com
text:
The freetds driver for APR, and hence Apache, has yet to be released.  Your
traceback shows it to be a PHP issue.  So if there's a bug it's theirs, not
ours.  Try asking in a PHP or FreeTDS forum before reporting a bug there.
